user_query: I want to integrate Vizor Ads into my website. Can you provide me with the details of my existing embed record with the slug '7dW8zGbP'? Additionally, inform me if the Vizor Ads API server is currently running.

TaskList.description: Query the Vizor Ads API to check the status of the API server.
Retrieve the embed record details using the slug '7dW8zGbP'.
